data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I have watched both the Lord of the Rings and the Hobbit and I would say the Hobbit is much better. The Lord of the Rings trilogy had some of the most breathtaking action sequences of all time, but the Hobbit trilogy had more of that stuff and fewer talky scenes. The only problem with all the action sequences in the Hobbit is that they’re generally inconsequential. Since the Hobbit is such a slim book, all the moments of action are quite brief and no one gets hurt. The director dragged these moments out to spectacular half-hour set pieces, but they had very little impact on the plot and the characters mostly came out of them unscathed. (117 words)
data.referenceText: Contrast two films you've seen or two books or stories you have read.
data.referenceTranslate: 对比你看过的两部电影或读过的两本书或故事。
